title: Shiji Zhang Personal Website
text:
Who am I
Hello everyone, this is Shiji Zhang, a fourth-year student at the University of Toronto. I am 21 years old now and come from Jinan City, Shandong Province, China. My major is Economics, with minors in Mathematics and Statistics. In STA302, I have learned a lot of new content that I haven’t studied before, especially how to write formal papers using R language and how to build personal websites, which is what I am currently doing.
There is three more parts of detail about me in the about page.


Hobby


Another identity


Experience/Achievements
If you want to know more about me, you can click on “about” to view more content about me. Hope you have a good day!

title: About
text: I am a passionate sports fan, especially when it comes to soccer and basketball. Not only do I enjoy watching these games, but I also love being involved. In middle school, I successfully founded the school’s soccer club, which didn’t exist before, and initiated the school’s first official soccer league. My favorite soccer club is Shandong Taishan Football Club, which is my hometown team. My favorite player is Messi. He is humble and has always remained grounded. In 2022, he finally won the World Cup, which he had dreamed of for so long. His journey has greatly influenced me and made me become a better person.

title: About
text:
Another identity
Besides being a student, another role I have is being a songwriter. In my own songs, I handle the arrangement, composition, lyrics, and vocals. I don’t expect to achieve success through music, but when I do this, it brings me immense joy, and my current songs have also gained some recognition. One of my songs achieved the Silver Single achievement on the NetEase Cloud Music platform in China. This keeps my passion and enthusiasm for music alive, and I want to continue pursuing it. If you’re interested, you can click on this link to listen to my songs：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2U1CjU7g7Mg

title: About
text:
Experience/Achievements
In more than a decade of student experience, I have also tried to improve my academic abilities and practical backgrounds. I have won some small and big awards and achievements. And I had my first internship experience last summer. I have organized all of these into the following CV. If you are interested, please take a look：My CV
